description: Try our easy to follow Fun Choc Fudge With Mini SMARTIES® recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fudge,Seafood free,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert
name: Fun Choc Fudge With Mini SMARTIES® Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease and line a 24 x 8cm bar pan with baking paper.

In a small saucepan, combine butter, sweetened condensed milk and sugar. Stir over low heat until smooth, simmer 5 minutes, stirring constantly. Remove from heat, add milk chocolate melts and mix until smooth.
Pour into prepared pan. Gently press smarties into top of fudge whist still warm. Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Use a hot knife to cut into small slices.
